content:
Okay, I see the layout. The goal is to get the citizens from the 'i' (input) at (12, 31) to the '*' (output) at (12, 0). There are demons at (1,6) and (1,15) and angels at (1,24) and (1,29). My avatar is at (6,2). There are a lot of boxes scattered throughout.

My strategy is to move the avatar to block the path of the bolts from the demons toward the citizens.
I'll start by moving up to potentially block the demon at (1,6).

```Action:4```
I will move the avatar up, trying to position it to block bolts from the demon at (1,6) towards the incoming citizens.

Okay, I see the layout. The avatar is at (5,2). There are demons on row 1, and angels on row 1 as well. The input is at (12,31) and the output is at (12,0). There are boxes scattered around. The first citizen will be spawned at (12,31) and will move toward the output located at (12,0). I need to protect the citizens from demons, while I can leverage the angels for salvation. Let's start by moving the avatar to the right to avoid the wall.

Action: 2
I expect the avatar to move to (5,3).

Action:3
I will move down to protect the citizens spawning from the bottom right.

Okay, I see the layout. The demons are at the top, and the angel is located at (6,3). The citizens are spawning at (12, 31) and need to go to (12, 0). There are a lot of boxes in the middle of the map. My avatar is located at (6,3). First, I need to move the avatar to the right.
Action: 2
I expect the avatar to move one step to the right.

Action:4
I will move the avatar up to protect the citizens in the output from the demon.

Action:3
I will move down to be closer to the citizens, I expect to move down to row 6.

The avatar is at (6,4). There is an angel at (1, 26). There are citizens at (12, 14), (12, 15), (12, 20), (12, 21), and (12, 27). There are demons at (1, 8), (1, 9), (1, 17), and (1, 18). There is a bolt at (3, 17). Boxes are scattered throughout the map. The input is at (12, 31), and the output is at (12, 0). The goal is to move the citizens from the input to the output without them becoming cursed.

I need to move the avatar to protect the citizens by blocking the bolts from the demons. I will start by moving the avatar down, since this will get the avatar closer to the citizens.
Action: 3

Okay, I understand the game and the current state. The avatar ('a') is currently at (7, 4). There are demons ('&') at (1, 8), (1, 9), (1, 17), and (1, 18) which are shooting bolts ('f') towards the center of the map. Citizens ('%') are spawning at the bottom right (12, 31) and need to reach the output at (12, 0). There are angels ('@') at (1,28) and (1,29). I need to protect the citizens from the demons' bolts.

My strategy is to move the avatar to block the bolts from hitting the citizens. I will start by moving up to row 6.
```Action:4```
I will move the avatar up one unit. I expect the avatar to be at (6,4) after this action, getting closer to intercepting the bolts.

Action:3
I will move down to get out of the initial position and be ready to protect the citizens.

The avatar is at (7,4). There's a box at (4,4), (4,5), (4,7), (5,11), (5,12), (5,26), (5,27), (5,28), (6,16), (6,19), (6,20), (7,7), (7,8), (8,4), (8,5), (8,9), (8,15), (8,19), (9,4), (9,5), (9,12), (9,19), (9,22), (9,27), (9,28), (11,5), (11,14), (11,25). The input is at (12,31) and the output is at (12,0). Demons are at (1,8), (1,9), (1,17), (1,18). Angels are at (1,28), (1,29).

I want to move right to position the avatar strategically near the boxes on row 7 and 8 to block bolts from the demons and direct citizens towards the output.
Action: 2

The avatar is located at row 7, col 5. The demons are located at row 1, col 9, row 1, col 10, row 1, col 18, and row 1, col 19. There are salvation at row 4, col 26 and row 4, col 27. The input is at row 12, col 31 and the output at row 12, col 0. The angels are at row 1, col 27 and row 1, col 28.

I should move right to push the box to protect the citizens from the demon.
Action: 2

The avatar is currently at (7,6). The goal is to protect the citizens (%). The demons are at (1,10) and (1,19) and shoot bolts, so I need to position myself to block them. The citizens are coming from the bottom right (12, 31) and need to make it to the top left (0,0). There is an angel at (1,27). I need to move up towards the trunk and the angel to protect the citizens.
Action:4
I'm moving the avatar up towards the angels to potentially get salvation projectiles or block the demons bolts.``` Action:4 ```

Action:3
The avatar is at (6,6), and I will move down to protect the citizens at (12,6) and (12,7) from demon's bolts.

Action:1
The avatar is at (7,6). Moving left to (7,5) will position the avatar near boxes, potentially allowing me to manipulate them to block incoming bolts.

Action:4
I will move the avatar up to protect the citizens. I expect the avatar to move up and potentially block some of the bolts from the demons.

The avatar is at (6, 5). I see demons at (1, 10), (1, 11), (1, 19), (1, 20). There is an angel at (1, 26), (1, 27), (1, 28), (1, 29). The input is at (12, 31) and the output is at (12, 0). There are boxes scattered around. The strategy suggests to protect the citizens from being cursed. To do that I should move towards the demons.

Action:2

There are angels at (1,25), (1,26), (1,29), (1,30) and demons at (1,11), (1,12), (1,20), (1,21). The citizens enter at (12,31) and exit at (12,0). There are bolts at (10,17) and (11,17).
I will move the avatar down to row 7, col 6.
Action: 3

Action:4
I will move up to row 6 to protect the citizens, it is the best way to start in this situation according to strategy.```
